meanings.definition: An alcoholic drink made from fermented grapes or other fruits.
meanings.sent1: At the party, they enjoyed different wines from various regions.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bottle of red wines for the dinner party.
meanings.sent3: The wines whispered stories of vineyards and sunshine.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled like sparkling wines on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The cellar was filled with the rich aroma of aged wines.

meanings.definition: To entertain someone by offering them wine.
meanings.sent1: He wines his guests with the finest selection from his collection.
meanings.sent2: She wines her friends whenever they come over for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The host wines the guests with tales of the vineyards.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the piano wines the audience into a relaxed state.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the cooking wines the guests as they wait in anticipation.

meanings.sent1: They wines together to celebrate their anniversary.
meanings.sent2: She wines a glass of white wine with her meal every evening.
meanings.sent3: He wines a glass of wine and suddenly becomes a great singer.
meanings.sent4: The sunset paints the sky with colors as she wines her glass.
meanings.sent5: The music softly playing in the background wines her as she relaxes with a glass of wine.
